idea-plugin.name: IntelliJ MCP Server
idea-plugin.description:
Model Context Protocol (MCP) server implementation for IntelliJ IDEA.

Provides tools for accessing project information, opening files, retrieving PSI (Program Structure Interface) data, and call hierarchies.

Features:
  • Get list of open projects
  • Open files in the IDE
  • Retrieve Java PSI (syntax tree) information
  • Get call hierarchy (callers/callees) for methods
